title: Is there a song called “Paid”? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, but these two spring to mind: "Just Got Paid" is a song by English DJ and record producer Sigala, English singer Ella Eyre and American singer-songwriter Meghan Trainor, featuring American rapper French Montana. It was written by Sigala, Trainor, Eyre, Nile Rodgers, Montana, The Invisible Men and Steve Manovski, and produced by Sigala, Joakim Jarl and Manovski. It was released to digital retailers on 7 September 2018, through Ministry of Sound Recordings and B1 Recordings. “Just Got Paid" is a million-selling, Platinum certified 1988 single by Bahamian R&B singer–songwriter Johnny Kemp. The song hit No. 1 on the U.S. R&B and Dance charts and reached the Top 10 on the Billboard Hot 100. [4] [5] It received a Grammy Awardnomination for Best R&B Song at the 31st Grammy Awards in 1989. It lost out to Anita Baker's "Giving You the Best That I Got".
